body.name: ZLKSKER 4 Pin PWM Fan Hub, PC Internal Fan Power Supply Extension Cable (13-Inch, 24AWG), 4 Pin & 3 Pin CPU Cooler Cooling Fan 1 to 5 Splitter 5 Way Adapter
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 mins
FREE pickup Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 mins
features: The hub can supply power to 5 fans, solving the problem of insufficient 4-pin temperature control socket on the motherboard.

This product is a hub, not a speed controller, the speed control function is provided by the motherboard, to get the speed control, you need to plug the hub into the 4-Pin socket with PWM on the motherboard. In addition, the hub’s CPU socket also has a speed measurement function.

The power of the 4-pin socket on the motherboard is limited, so when connecting the fan to the hub, you need to pay attention that the total power of the fans cannot be greater than the maximum power provided by the motherboard.
This hub can also be compatible with 3-pin fans, due to 3 pins no PWM controller, 3-pin fans will run in full speed.

Cable length: 13 inches (33.0 cm). 1007 24AWG Tin-plated copper wire. Strong conductivity, corrosion and oxidation resistance. The wire insulating layer is made of PVC, insulated, flame retardant and safer.
body.description: About the hub 1. 4-pin PWM 1 to 5 splitter hub is designed for audiophiles who need to control multiple fans. The solder joints are reinforced and not easy to break. Plug and play. 2. Only CPU socket of the PWM splitter carries RPM signal due to one motherboard connector only read one RPM signal, this is why only the CPU socket has a speed measurement function.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 196 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4 Pin PWM Fan Hub, 1 to 5 Splitter Cable length: 13 inches (33.0 cm). 1007 24AWG Tin-plated copper wire. for 4 Pin & 3 Pin CPU Cooling Fan.

About the hub 1. 4-pin PWM 1 to 5 splitter hub is designed for audiophiles who need to control multiple fans. The solder joints are reinforced and not easy to break. Plug and play. 2. Only CPU socket of the PWM splitter carries RPM signal due to one motherboard connector only read one RPM signal, this is why only the CPU socket has a speed measurement function. Note: Please insert the hub firmly on the motherboard before use The hub can connect up to 5 4Pin/3Pin fans CPU socket connects to CPU fan, other sockets connect to normal fan Note that connecting 3-pin fan has no speed regulation function Make sure the total power of all fans does not exceed the maximum power of the motherboard socket

Good Material & Good Construction. 1. What is Tin-plated copper wire? A thin layer of tin is plated on the surface of the copper wire. It looks silver. It has good electrical conductivity, Compared with bare copper wire stronger corrosion resistance and oxidation resistance, which can greatly extend the service life of the wire. 2. What is 1007 wire? 1007 wire is a kind of electronic wire, which is the internal wiring of electrical equipment. The insulating layer uses PVC material; The conductor uses copper wire or tinned copper wire (ZLKSKER wires all use tinned copper wire); Rated temperature: 80°C; Rated voltage: 300V; Pass UL VW-1 flame resistance test. 3. 24AWG (American Wire Gauge) wire standard: Conductor diameter: 0.61mm; Wire outer diameter: 1.41mm; Number of strands: 11.

Hub socket introduction CPU socket: Connected to the CPU fan, with speed regulation and speed measurement function. FAN1-FAN4 socket: Connected to the fan of ordinary computer chassis, with speed regulation function. The above sockets support 3-pin 4-pin fans, but 3-pin fans have no speed adjustment function, which means 3-pin fans can only run at full speed. It has a cable sleeve, which can help with cable management within the compact computer case, make your case look neater, and also keep the wires away from the motherboard and other hardware. Hub: 2.0×0.7inches Cable: 13.0inches This hub has glue on the back so you can fix it in place

4 inch 24Pin to 14Pin Cable 8 inch 8Pin CPU Power Cable 8 inch 4Pin CPU Power Cable 12 inch 24Pin to 14Pin Cable 12 inch 24Pin-24Pin ATX Power Supply Extension Cable without Sleeve 24 Pin PSU Sleeved Extension Cable 12 Inch Quantity 1 1 1 1 1 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfect no problems
reviews.reviewText: Product was very well made did its job and was very easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it. So useful and easy to use. I was able to hook up multiple fans to this when my board didn't offer enough PWM ports. This was a lifesaver. I ended up buying a second one to just have on-hand when I needed it next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the thing
reviews.reviewText: This little thingy is great for getting closer to pieces that need connection in the computer case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fan splitter!
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as advertised. The bottom sticky part is a little to thick. Had to replace it with thinner 3M double sided tape!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recomendado para fans sin RGB
reviews.reviewText: Es funcional si, pero podría ser mejor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick ship, good quality, just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: solved my fan connectivity problem without breaking the bank and it was surprisingly well made. Overall, if you need to add a few more fan headers, this product does the trick. I have full control over the group with bios and my fan control software, and after setting it all up the temps in my case components are nice and low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Caused blown fuse. No fuse protection. Buyer beware.
reviews.reviewText: The circuit board separated from the adhesive tape, short circuited and caused a blown fuse on the motherboard. Buyer beware. Very cheap materials from the appearance

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to install product
reviews.reviewText: Packaging was taped over so much it was harder getting the product out than putting in PC.
It's working well, easy to install and also it's doesnt mess up the fan curves, everything is perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023

reviews.reviewText: This product function as intended and works well with any PC setup you may have--and especially if you're looking to install more PWM fans easily--but your motherboard doesn't have enough slots for them. Overall, a great value buy for those looking to install extra PWM fans.
The foam tape stopped sticking very early on, and started to fall away on it's own.Other than that, it's a 1-4 splitter on a board. Great.
Does the job and no problem it stick very well to the computer. Not desapointed in this product.
